Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: kim07
Reviews.Content: This phone is just great. You can use to make international call using VOIP, and you can read MS Word and Excel Attachements. The most important is the warranty.

Reviews.Title: It's a Copy
Reviews.Author: eduardo sandez
Reviews.Content: What a piece of crab, this is not an original phone, and it's not unlocked it does not work with my sim card, i bought this phone from world-supplier, and he just sent me a copy  and i can't return it because the seller is in china and is to expensive to send it there i lost my money buying this piece of crab, i wont recommend, this seller, i'm very unhappy and disappoint, people like this seller dont deserve to be in amazon.

Reviews.Title: rubbish
Reviews.Author: omer kirmaci
Reviews.Content: I was dissapointed when buy this prduct. It has come from china and it is not original product . if i had chance i would sent it back certainly. Headphone is not fitting it is totally broke. it is not working properly. You can understand how perishable it is, while you are holding in your hands.

Reviews.Title: Very nice cellphone
Reviews.Author: TETAY- seventeen "TETAY"
Reviews.Content: I bought the nokia E65 2 weeks ago and so far I'm very satisfied with this cellphone and very happy that we purchased it. It has pretty much of everything i wanted in a cellphone.  I'm still getting used to it though, but everyday this phone surprises me as I'm learning and working on its features and stuffs.Recommend this phone????  Well, i would definitely encourage everybody to try this phone. THIS IS A ONE COOL GADGET!!!
